m_szDocTitle: 2 Wonderful Elon Musk Videos I Love
m_szDocSumamry: He comes across as a humble man to me Ross Yes, the trappings of success are probably an incidental nice to have to him. It is better to have adulation of fanboys and girls than the hatred figures like the Koch bros, probably deservedly, get. But he appears to have the correct priorities as far as developing human technological capabilities goes. Karl the brewer Musk is an example of what can occur when you combine brains, money and motivation. An infrequent combination but when it does happen itâ€™s almost unstoppable. And to add a UK perspective to the frequent Edison comparisons i often think
